      • getSteerAngle

        public static double getSteerAngle(double wheelPosition)
                            throws Exception
        Get [-100,100] percent and it give back a value which between -60 and 60 degree.
        Parameters:
        wheelPosition - in percent form.
        Returns:
        steeringAngle between -60 and 60 degree.
        Throws:
        Exception - wrong parameter Exception
